regen.absent_element: visual indication if a call cannot be connected
regen.new_specification: If the system is not able to connect the call, a visual indication shall also be provided to the driver.

regen.absent_element: visual indication when system cannot connect the call
regen.new_specification: If the system is not able to connect the call, a visual indication shall be provided to the driver.

regen.absent_element: Feedback to the calling driver when call gets disconnected due to network issues
regen.new_specification: If the call is terminated due to network issues, the system shall provide an audible indication to the calling driver about the disconnection.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
absence: the visual indication shall be provided
